info.title: KeyVaultClient
info.description: The key vault client performs cryptographic key operations and vault operations against the Key Vault service.

enabled.description: Determines whether the object is enabled.

Attributes.description: The object attributes managed by the KeyVault service.

trigger.description: The condition that will execute the action.

action.description: The action that will be executed.

LifetimeActions.description: Action and its trigger that will be performed by Key Vault over the lifetime of a key or secret.

timeAfterCreate.description: Time after creation to attempt to rotate. It only applies to rotate. It will be in ISO 8601 duration format. Example: 90 days : "P90D"

timeBeforeExpiry.description: Time before expiry to attempt to rotate or notify. It will be in ISO 8601 duration format. Example: 90 days : "P90D"

LifetimeActionsTrigger.description: A condition to be satisfied for an action to be executed.

values.description: Rotate the key or secret based on the rotation policy.
Trigger event grid events. For preview, the notification time is not configurable and it is default to 30 days before expiry.

LifetimeActionsType.description: The action that will be executed.
